dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Okay, but you will not believe this number. 1,220 specialists!

dialogue_turns.text: Whoa, wait, for what? What are we even talking about right now?

dialogue_turns.text: Road maintenance, right? In Kazakhstan! They've put in these huge traffic restrictions.

dialogue_turns.text: It's ten national highways, across six regions! Six whole regions!

dialogue_turns.text: Yes, exactly! That's not just a small local thing, is it?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yes, exactly! That's not just a small local thing, is it?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: And get this, 558 units of special equipment! All out there!

dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Currently, 558 units of special equipment and 1,220 specialists are engaged in road maintenance.

dialogue_turns.text: So, is it weather? Like, major snow or something? Or just general upkeep?
